section.title: Introduction
section.para: This guide contains advanced configuration information for system administrators working with the Delegation Service. It provides references to information on procedures typically performed by system administrators, including installation, configuring, deploying, and testing the installation.
This information is in addition to the basic installation instructions in the GT 4.0 System Administrator's Guide.

section.title: Building and Installing
section.para: Refer to System Administrator's guide for installation instructions.

section.title: Deploying
section.para: [information about deploying the component into various containers/environments]

listitem.simpara: Install delegation service test package (gt4-cas-delegation-test-3.9-src_bundle.tar.gz using GPT build FILLME: instructions into GLOBUS_LOCATION

listitem.para: To run tests, ant -f share/globus_wsrf_test/runtests.xml runServer -Dtests.jar=$GLOBUS_LOCATION/lib/globus_delegation_test.jar

listitem.simpara: Test reports are put in $GLOBUS_LOCATION/share/globus_wsrf_test/tests/test-reports in a file called TEST-org.globus.delegation.service.PackageTests.xml
